channel.title: Projects on Elliot Snow-Kropla
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Elliot Snow-Kropla

item.title: SponsorHub.io
item.description: SponsorHub.io is a platform for video game developers to sponsor Let’s Plays and streams, and for streamers and Let’s Players to find sponsors for their videos and streams.

item.title: Runway Calculator
item.description: Runway Calculator connects to your bank and models your cashflow to predict your startup’s death (or profitability!) date.

item.title: Hairy Little Buggers
item.description: A simulation-management game where your goal is to keep your rude full of ’tude dwarfs alive against the goblins, demons, and their own filth.
